argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rdglim2a | |- ( ( A e. V /\ Lim A ) -> ( rec ( har , _om ) ` A ) = U_ x e. A ( rec ( har , _om ) ` x ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_df-aleph | |- aleph = rec ( har , _om ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_fveq1i | |- ( aleph ` A ) = ( rec ( har , _om ) ` A ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_fveq1i | |- ( aleph ` x ) = ( rec ( har , _om ) ` x ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_a1i | |- ( x e. A -> ( aleph ` x ) = ( rec ( har , _om ) ` x ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_iuneq2i | |- U_ x e. A ( aleph ` x ) = U_ x e. A ( rec ( har , _om ) ` x ) |
| 7 | 1, 3, 6 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ( A e. V /\ Lim A ) -> ( aleph ` A ) = U_ x e. A ( aleph ` x ) ) |
